name: big-hero
description: Advanced hero section with full customization options including video backgrounds, animations, and flexible content positioning. Perfect for impactful landing pages and marketing websites.
author: PayloadKit
features: 5 content positioning options: center, top-center, bottom-center, left-center, right-center
5 background types: color, gradient, image, video, none
Video background support with poster image fallback
Background overlay with customizable color and opacity
3 text color themes: white, dark, primary
3 text alignment options: left, center, right
5 title size options: sm, md, lg, xl, hero
Parallax scrolling effect for background elements
Smooth scroll indicator with bounce animation
Rich text support for description content
Button styling with 3 appearances and 3 sizes
Custom CSS injection for advanced styling
Accessibility features with proper semantic structure
usage: Perfect for impactful landing pages, product launches, marketing campaigns, portfolio showcases, and any situation requiring a bold, visually striking hero section with professional video or image backgrounds.

preview.description: Advanced hero section with video background and animations

setup.dependencies: Make sure you have Lucide React and Tailwind CSS configured in your project.
setup.components: This block uses the blocks-shared registry components. Make sure to install them first: payloadkit add blocks-shared
setup.video: For video backgrounds, ensure your video files are optimized for web (MP4 format recommended) and hosted on a reliable CDN for best performance.
